availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonas Martin (Livingston and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and politician.)

body.p: Livingston and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of Solomon W. Martin and Altezera Martin. Married to Fransannah Stone in Lyon County on October 25, 1854. Laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Livingston County from 1862 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky Caldwell County, District No. 1, p. 337A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 692.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 32B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000321364.
Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, Ky.: Collins & Co., 1882), p. 479.
